export var dim_LIMIT=25;export function drawMatrix(matrixData,canvas,ctx){var dimensions=matrixData.split('\n')[0];var num_rows=parseInt(dimensions.split(',')[0]);var num_cols=parseInt(dimensions.split(',')[1]);var elements=matrixData.split('\n')[1];var data=elements.split(',');canvas.width=num_rows*50;canvas.height=num_cols*50;// Iterate through the rows and columns of the matrix
for(var i=0;i<num_rows;i++){for(var j=0;j<num_cols;j++){// Draw a cell with a border
ctx.beginPath();ctx.rect(j*50,i*50,50,50);ctx.stroke();// Display the element of the matrix in the cell
ctx.font='24px Arial';ctx.fillStyle='grey';ctx.textAlign='center';ctx.fillText(data[i*num_cols+j],j*50+25,i*50+35);}}}// Returns true or false depending on whether matrix is correct format
export function parseMatrix(matrix){// Check dimensions
var dimensions=matrix.split('\n')[0];var num_rows=parseInt(dimensions.split(',')[0]);var num_cols=parseInt(dimensions.split(',')[1]);if(isNaN(num_rows)||isNaN(num_cols)){return false;}if(num_rows>dim_LIMIT||num_cols>dim_LIMIT){return false;}// Check elements
var elements=matrix.split('\n')[1];var elements_array=elements.split(',');if(elements_array.length!==num_rows*num_cols){return false;}for(var i=0;i<elements_array.length;i++){if(isNaN(parseInt(elements_array[i]))){return false;}}return true;}// Define an array of button data, where each item contains a button label and a function ID
var buttonData=[// Basic opertions (0x10 - 0x1F)
{label:'Add',func_id:0x10},{label:'Multiply',func_id:0x11},{label:'Transpose',func_id:0x12},{label:'Inverse',func_id:0x13},// Direct methods for solving (0x20 - 0x2F)
{label:'Gauss Elimination',func_id:0x20},{label:'Blank',func_id:0x21},{label:'Blank',func_id:0x22},{label:'Blank',func_id:0x23},// Indirect methods for solving (0x30 - 0x3F)
{label:'Jacobi Method',func_id:0x30},{label:'Blank',func_id:0x31},{label:'Blank',func_id:0x32},{label:'Blank',func_id:0x33},// Preconditioner (0x40 - 0x4F)
{label:'Blank',func_id:0x40},{label:'Blank',func_id:0x41},{label:'Blank',func_id:0x42},{label:'Blank',func_id:0x43}];export default buttonData;
